UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide therapeutics for cystic fibrosis.
Literature.Author: Zhang L, Parente J, Harris SM, Woods DE, Hancock RE, Falla TJ

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human fibroblasts WI-38:LD50=950 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>1000 µg/ml,Human leukocytes:LD50=>500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=100µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MFC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=>60µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=75µg/ml),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(LD50=540µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW480(LD50=>1000µg/ml),Human melanoma BMKC(LD50=>1000µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma H1299(LD50=720µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa S3(LD50=>1000µg/ml),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(LD50=630µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M76(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M917(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1251(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1426(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa R70(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>128µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas stutzeri(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens(MIC=8µg/ml),Ralstonia pickettii(MIC=8µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=2µg/ml),Achromobacter xylosoxidans(MIC=32µg/ml)
